body: closing an opening the PR to trigger CI
cherry-picked the change which enables CI from master and pushed to this branch.
Seems like the big blocking issue is that `Add-Type` is broken.   Looks like the problem is some ref assemblies are missing.  Investigating...

@SteveL-MSFT, your last commit had 1 failures in `PowerShell-CI-static-analysis`
Verify Markdown Links.Verify links in /home/vsts/work/1/s/docs/testing-guidelines/CodeCoverageAnalysis.md.https://codecov.io/gh/PowerShell/PowerShell should work
```powershell
retry of URL failed with error: 
at <ScriptBlock>, /home/vsts/work/1/s/test/common/markdown/markdown-link.tests.ps1: line 113
113:                                 throw "retry of URL failed with error: $($_.Message)"

```

@SteveL-MSFT, your last commit had 9 failures in `PowerShell-CI-macos`
(These are 5 of the failures)

Validate Update-Help from the Web for one PowerShell Core module..Validate Update-Help for module 'Microsoft.PowerShell.Core' with scope as 'False'
```powershell
Expected 1, but got 0.
at <ScriptBlock>, /Users/vsts/agent/2.150.0/work/1/s/test/powershell/engine/Help/UpdatableHelpSystem.Tests.ps1: line 181
181:     $helpFilesInstalled.Count | Should -Be $expectedHelpFiles.Count
```
Send-MailMessage.Error occurred in Describe block
```powershell
Cannot bind argument to parameter 'Path' because it is null.
At /Users/vsts/agent/2.150.0/work/1/s/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Send-MailMessage.Tests.ps1:11 char:30
```
Validate 'Save-Help -DestinationPath for one PowerShell Core modules..Validate Save-Help for the 'Microsoft.PowerShell.Core' module
```powershell
Expected 'Microsoft.PowerShell.Core_00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000_en-US_HelpContent.zip', because Save-Help for  should download 'Microsoft.PowerShell.Core_00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000_en-US_HelpContent.zip', but got $null.
at <ScriptBlock>, /Users/vsts/agent/2.150.0/work/1/s/test/powershell/engine/Help/UpdatableHelpSystem.Tests.ps1: line 333
333:     $compressedFile | Should -Be $expectedCompressedFile -Because "Save-Help for $module should download '$expectedCompressedFile'"
```
Hard link and symbolic link tests.New-Item and hard/symbolic links.New-Item can create symbolic link to file
```powershell
Expected exactly '/tmp/4dd728f4-93b7-46e4-9299-f7c773ce4676/file.txt', but got /.
at <ScriptBlock>, /Users/vsts/agent/2.150.0/work/1/s/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Management/FileSystem.Tests.ps1: line 455
455:             $link.Target[0] | Should -BeExactly $real.ToString()
```

```powershell

at <ScriptBlock>, /Users/vsts/agent/2.150.0/work/1/s/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Management/FileSystem.Tests.ps1: line 464
464:             $link.Target[0] | Should -Be $nonFile.ToString()
```

Dot-source operator is not allowed in modules on locked down systems that export functions with wildcards.Verifies that a classes only module with dot-source and with using directive loads successfully
```powershell
The term 'PublicUsingFn' is not recognized as the name of a cmdlet, function, script file, or operable program.
Check the spelling of the name, or if a path was included, verify that the path is correct and try again.
at <ScriptBlock>, D:\a\1\s\test\powershell\Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Security\ConstrainedLanguageModules.Tests.ps1: line 426
426:                 $result = PublicUsingFn

```
Import trusted manifest files in system lockdown mode.Verifies that trusted manifest with nested modules and no extension module exports explicit function
```powershell
Cannot load the module 'C:\Users\VSSADM~1\AppData\Local\Temp\a232a9cf-e1dd-4967-93c0-c4b460e52cde\ImportTrustedManifestWithNestedModsAndNoExtNoFnExport_System32' because the module nesting limit has been exceeded. Modules can only be nested to 10 levels. Evaluate and change the order in which you are loading modules to prevent exceeding the nesting limit, and then try running your script again.
at <ScriptBlock>, D:\a\1\s\test\powershell\Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Security\ConstrainedLanguageModules.Tests.ps1: line 1214
1214:                 $module = Import-Module -Name $manifestFileName -Force -PassThru

```
